title: WOW! Rudhramadevi Gets 4/5 Stars Rating
text:
Receive all updates via Facebook. Just Click the Like Button Below Don't ask Again 
Gunasekhar's dream project, India's first 3D stereoscopic film, Rudhramadevi has been getting unanimous positive reports from the initial reviews while even India's biggest blockbuster, Baahubali carried negative reports before the release. 
Apparently, Kiaara Sandhu, who claims to be an Editor at Indian Cinema Magazine, a member of Censor Board in Middle East and also a Film Distributor in Dubai has reviewed Rudhramadevi, a day ahead of the release. 
"Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #Rudhramadevi. A Well Made Film all the Way. #AnushkaShetty @RanaDaggubati @alluarjun Steals the Show. ☆☆☆☆", she tweeted claiming to have watched the movie in a special screening. 
In the past, Kiaara reviewed Telugu biggies like Baahubali and Srimanthudu as well. She had to face the ire of Telugu movie lovers for bashing Baahubali very badly while she caught the attention of Mahesh Babu fans for giving 5/5 for Srimanthudu . 
However, the sources from team Rudhramadevi informed that there wasn't any special screening held in Dubai. Well! Only Kiaara knows where she has seen the film. Nevertheless, Telugu movie lovers are excited to hear positive reports from the lady. 
Movie buffs across the globe are eyeing on Rudhramadevi since it is the first high budgeted film from Telugu after the phenomenal success of Baahubali. On that note, keep glued to this more for updates on Rudhramadevi. WOW! Rudhramadevi Gets 4/5 Stars Rating 1/7 Indian Cinema Magazine UAE Review #Rudhramadevi .A Well Made Film all the Way. #AnushkaShetty @RanaDaggubati @alluarjun Steals the Show. ☆☆☆☆— Kiaara Sandhu (@KiaaraSandhu) October 8, 2015 Review 
Kiaara Sandhu's review on Gunasekhar's Rudhramadevi. WOW! Rudhramadevi Gets 4/5 Stars Rating 2/7 #Rudhramadevi to get Entertainment Tax Exemption in Telangana! Thank you KCR garu for your support and encouragement pic.twitter.com/3nhJ2FoNgK
